content.div:
Jennifer Lopez is out to set the record straight on Oscar Nipplegate.

Following the brouhaha that resulted from the possibility of Lopez's little Jennys from the Block poking out of her revealing Zuhair Murad dress at Sunday's Academy Awards, the "I'm Real" singer addressed the issue on Tuesday's American Idol telecast.

"There was no nipple!" J.Lo exclaimed after fellow Idol judge Steven Tyler exposed his left nipple in a gag host Ryan Seacrest aptly described as an "Oscar reenactment."

Lopez's declaration follows a similarly adamant statement from her stylist, Mariel Haenn, who denied there was an Oscar nip slip, claiming that the dress came with built-in cups to prevent showing a little or a lot of her papis.

Check out Tyler's Idol reenactment and Lopez's defense below:

jond@dose.ca
